aboutMe.title: Because I know what it's like to start from scratch (and without a network)
aboutMe.bio:
I'm Alexandra Ribeiro, a computer engineer who traded 20 years of corporate life for entrepreneurship — and believe me, I know exactly what that roller coaster feels like!

Today, I'm that technical partner you need when launching your business. The person who configures all those boring systems (well, they have their days...) that nobody wants to learn, but are essential to get started: domains, emails, online stores, automations, and even artificial intelligence.

I love transforming 'complicated technical stuff' into practical solutions that actually work, something I realized when I was doing the same during my own journey!

Consider me your technical partner on the launch journey — I take care of the systems so you can focus on what really matters: growing your business!

about.title: About Me
about.description: Meet Alexandra Ribeiro, a virtual assistant specialized in administrative and technological support for businesses in Portugal

points: When you decided to leave corporate comfort to start your own business, a flood of technical questions emerged, didn't they?
"How do I set up a professional email? Which invoicing system should I choose? CRM? Shopify or WordPress? How do I integrate all this?"
And suddenly, instead of focusing on your business, you're on YouTube trying to understand technical configurations until the early hours of the morning.

I know this journey well because I've walked it too. After 20 years in the corporate world as a computer engineer, I decided to take that leap. And I discovered that even with all my technical knowledge, the number of decisions and configurations was intimidating.
That's exactly why today I help entrepreneurs like you implement uncomplicated systems.

story.title: My Story
paragraphs: I'm Alexandra Ribeiro, a computer engineer by training and passionate about helping businesses grow in an organized and efficient way. I bring over 20 years of experience in technology consulting, support for editorial projects, and e-commerce management.
Throughout my career, I've worked with dozens of companies in Portugal and internationally, helping them optimize processes, implement systems, and improve customer communication.
My approach combines technical knowledge with marketing and communication strategies, allowing me to offer a truly comprehensive service to my clients.
If you stumbled on my page, someone probably told you about me and that is an excellent thing because for the last 10 years I have been behind the scenes promoting my clients.

items.title: Simplicity
items.description: I believe technology should serve people, not the other way around. That's why I transform the complex into simple. If I can explain it without technical jargon, it means the solution is on the right track.

items.title: Autonomy
items.description: I implement systems that grow with your business and that you can manage without constantly depending on technical specialists.

items.title: Empatia
items.description: I've been on the other side. I understand your doubts, fears, and frustrations with technology. There are no "silly questions" when it comes to systems!

items.title: Practicality
items.description: I focus on solutions that work in real life, not just in theory. I prefer a simple system that you use every day over a complex one that ends up abandoned.
Implementation of technological solutions for small and medium businesses, focusing on automation and efficiency.
Coordination of editorial projects, from conception to publication, for national and international publishers.
Development and management of online stores, optimization of sales processes and customer service.

items.question: What pricing options are available?
items.answer: Depending on your case and the services you need, we evaluate what makes the most sense for you. We have options for hour packages (5, 10, 20), project-based (for cases where there is a final delivery), or monthly retainer for a set of fixed tasks to be performed.

items.question: How can I get a quote?
items.answer:
You can schedule a 15-minute call where we get to know each other and talk a bit about what you need, and together we figure out what might make the most sense for you.

To do this, simply click the "Schedule a call" button at the top of the page and select the best available date/time on the calendar.

If you prefer, you can also send your message through the quick form on the "Contact" page or send me an email at geral@alexandraribeiro.pt.

items.question: How are monthly consumed hours measured?
items.answer:
I use time tracking tools (Toggl) to ensure time is correctly recorded and allocated to each task I perform for you.

At the end of each week/month, I send a list with details of the time consumed.

items.question: How are services invoiced?
items.answer: For hour packages, the invoice is issued at the beginning of the month and always relates to the services/hours of the respective month. For one-time projects, 50% is charged upon project approval and 50% upon final delivery.

items.question: Is it possible to sign a non-disclosure agreement (NDA)?
items.answer: Yes, I sign confidentiality agreements for all clients when requested, which is also covered in the contract we sign at the beginning of our work together. The privacy and security of your information are absolute priorities in my work!
